text: Is there a way to create a dataframe that dosn't use `DataFrames.jl`? Or someway to create a csv? I have some simulation results I'd like to export to a csv, but adding in the Dataframes dependency is just too much for it

elements.text: Is there a way to create a dataframe that dosn't use
? Or someway to create a csv? I have some simulation results I'd like to export to a csv, but adding in the Dataframes dependency is just too much for it

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
and if you don't want/need DataFrames, just CSV.jl should be plenty

elements.text: and if you don't want/need DataFrames, just CSV.jl should be plenty

text: You don't need the DataFrames.jl package, if you create a NamedTuple, for example, you can directly save everything to CSV.

elements.text: You don't need the DataFrames.jl package, if you create a NamedTuple, for example, you can directly save everything to CSV.
